description.p: With Kid3, an audio tag editor, you can:

ul.li: Edit tags in MP3, Ogg/Vorbis, FLAC, Opus, MPC, APE, MP4/AAC, MP2, Speex, TrueAudio, WavPack, WMA, WAV, AIFF and tracker files
Edit all ID3v1.1, ID3v2.3 and ID3v2.4 frames in your MP3 files and convert between them
Edit tags of multiple files, e.g. the artist, album, year and genre of all files of an album typically have the same values and can be set together
Edit synchronized lyrics, import and export LRC Karaoke files
Generate tags from filenames or the contents of other tag fields
Generate filenames from tags, rename directories from tags
Automatic case conversion and string translation
Import and export album data, generate playlist files
Import from gnudb.org, TrackType.org, MusicBrainz, Discogs, Amazon
Automatic batch import for multiple directories
